comment.shortText:
Attaches an event handler outside directly to the `document`,
bypassing the react synthetic event system.

comment.text: Whether or not to listen during the capture event phase

mdx.rawBody: Whether or not to listen during the capture event phase

markdownRemark.rawMarkdownBody: Whether or not to listen during the capture event phase
markdownRemark.html: Whether or not to listen during the capture event phase

mdx.rawBody:
Attaches an event handler outside directly to the `document`,
bypassing the react synthetic event system.
```ts
useGlobalListener('keydown', (event) => {
 console.log(event.key)
})
```

markdownRemark.rawMarkdownBody:
Attaches an event handler outside directly to the `document`,
bypassing the react synthetic event system.
```ts
useGlobalListener('keydown', (event) => {
 console.log(event.key)
})
```

Attaches an event handler outside directly to the document, bypassing the react synthetic event system.

useGlobalListener('keydown', (event) => {

})

tags.name: param
tags.value: Whether or not to listen during the capture event phase
